titles.title: Health Insurance Premium Deductibility Act of 1997
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow health insurance premiums to be fully deductible to the extent not in excess of $3,000.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 1/7/1997--Introduced. Health Insurance Premium Deductibility Act of 1997 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a deduction for health insurance premiums of up to $3,000.
